00040 struct CV
00041 {

00045     std::string version;
00046 
00047     bool empty() const;

00050 
00051 struct UserParam
00052 {
00053     std::string name;
00054     std::string value;
00055     std::string type;
00056 
00057     UserParam(const std::string& _name = "", 
00058               const std::string& _value = "", 
00059               const std::string& _type = "");
00060 
00061     /// templated value access with type conversion
00062     template<typename value_type>
00063     value_type valueAs() const
00064     {
00065         return !value.empty() ? boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(value) 
00066                               : boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(0);
00067     } 
00068 
00069     bool empty() const;
00070     bool operator==(const UserParam& that) const;
00071     bool operator!=(const UserParam& that) const;
00072 };
00073 
00074 
00075 /// special case for bool (outside the class for gcc 3.4, and inline for msvc)
00076 template<>
00077 inline bool UserParam::valueAs<bool>() const
00078 {
00079     return value == "true";
00080 }

00083 struct ParamGroup;
00084 typedef boost::shared_ptr<ParamGroup> ParamGroupPtr;

00086 
00087 struct ParamContainer
00088 {
00089     std::vector<ParamGroupPtr> paramGroupPtrs;
00090     std::vector<CVParam> cvParams;
00091     std::vector<UserParam> userParams;
00092     
00093     /// Finds cvid in the container:
00094     /// - returns first CVParam result such that (result.cvid == cvid); 
00095     /// - if not found, returns CVParam(CVID_Unknown)
00096     /// - recursive: looks into paramGroupPtrs
00097     CVParam cvParam(CVID cvid) const; 
00098 
00099     /// Finds child of cvid in the container:
00100     /// - returns first CVParam result such that (result.cvid is_a cvid); 
00101     /// - if not found, CVParam(CVID_Unknown)
00102     /// - recursive: looks into paramGroupPtrs
00103     CVParam cvParamChild(CVID cvid) const; 
00104 
00105     /// returns true iff cvParams contains exact cvid (recursive)
00106     bool hasCVParam(CVID cvid) const;
00107 
00108     /// returns true iff cvParams contains a child (is_a) of cvid (recursive)
00109     bool hasCVParamChild(CVID cvid) const;
00110 
00111     /// Finds UserParam with specified name 
00112     /// - returns UserParam() if name not found 
00113     /// - not recursive: looks only at local userParams
00114     UserParam userParam(const std::string&) const; 
00115 
00116     /// set/add a CVParam (not recursive)
00117     void set(CVID cvid, const std::string& value = "", CVID units = CVID_Unknown);
00118 
00119     /// set/add a CVParam (not recursive)
00120     template <typename value_type>
00121     void set(CVID cvid, value_type value, CVID units = CVID_Unknown)
00122     {
00123         set(cvid, boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(value), units);
00124     }
00125 
00126     bool empty() const;
00127 };
00128 
00129 
00130 /// special case for bool (outside the class for gcc 3.4, and inline for msvc)
00131 template<>
00132 inline void ParamContainer::set<bool>(CVID cvid, bool value, CVID units)
00133 {
00134     set(cvid, (value ? "true" : "false"), units);
00135 }

00382 struct Spectrum : public SpectrumIdentity, public ParamContainer
00383 {
00384     size_t defaultArrayLength; 
00385     DataProcessingPtr dataProcessingPtr;
00386     SourceFilePtr sourceFilePtr;
00387     SpectrumDescription spectrumDescription;
00388     std::vector<BinaryDataArrayPtr> binaryDataArrayPtrs; 
00389 
00390     Spectrum() : defaultArrayLength(0) {}
00391 
00392     bool empty() const;
00393 
00394     /// copy binary data arrays into m/z-intensity pair array
00395     void getMZIntensityPairs(std::vector<MZIntensityPair>& output) const;
00396 
00397     /// copy binary data arrays into m/z-intensity pair array
00398     /// note: this overload is to allow client to allocate own buffer; the client
00399     /// must determine the correct size beforehand, or an exception will be thrown
00400     void getMZIntensityPairs(MZIntensityPair* output, size_t expectedSize) const;
00401 
00402     /// set binary data arrays 
00403     void setMZIntensityPairs(const std::vector<MZIntensityPair>& input);
00404 
00405     /// set binary data arrays 
00406     void setMZIntensityPairs(const MZIntensityPair* input, size_t size);
00407 };

00410 typedef boost::shared_ptr<Spectrum> SpectrumPtr;
00411 
00412 
00413 /// 
00414 /// Interface for accessing spectra, which may be stored in memory
00415 /// or backed by a data file (RAW, mzXML, mzML).  
00416 ///
00417 /// Implementation notes:
00418 ///
00419 /// - Implementations are expected to keep a spectrum index in the form of
00420 ///   vector<SpectrumIdentity> or equivalent.  The default find*() functions search
00421 ///   the index linearly.  Implementations may provide constant time indexing.
00422 ///
00423 /// - The semantics of spectrum() may vary slightly with implementation.  In particular,
00424 ///   a SpectrumList implementation that is backed by a file may choose either to cache 
00425 ///   or discard the SpectrumPtrs for future access, with the caveat that the client 
00426 ///   may write to the underlying data.
00427 ///
00428 /// - It is the implementation's responsibility to return a valid SpectrumPtr from spectrum().
00429 ///   If this cannot be done, an exception must be thrown. 
00430 /// 
00431 /// - The 'getBinaryData' flag is a hint if false : implementations may provide valid 
00432 ///   BinaryDataArrayPtrs on spectrum(index, false);  implementations *must* provide 
00433 ///   valid BinaryDataArrayPtrs on spectrum(index, true).
00434 ///
00435 class SpectrumList
00436 {
00437     public:
00438     
00439     /// returns the number of spectra
00440     virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00441 
00442     /// returns true iff (size() == 0)
00443     bool empty() const;
00444 
00445     /// access to a spectrum index
00446     virtual const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const = 0;
00447 
00448     /// find id in the spectrum index (returns size() on failure)
00449     virtual size_t find(const std::string& id) const;
00450 
00451     /// find nativeID in the spectrum index (returns size() on failure)
00452     virtual size_t findNative(const std::string& nativeID) const;
00453 
00454     /// retrieve a spectrum by index
00455     /// - binary data arrays will be provided if (getBinaryData == true);
00456     /// - client may assume the underlying Spectrum* is valid 
00457     virtual SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData = false) const = 0;
00458 
00459     virtual ~SpectrumList(){} 
00460 };
00461 
00462 
00463 typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumList> SpectrumListPtr;
00464 
00465 
00466 /// Simple writeable in-memory implementation of SpectrumList.
00467 /// Note:  This spectrum() implementation returns internal SpectrumPtrs.
00468 struct SpectrumListSimple : public SpectrumList
00469 {
00470     std::vector<SpectrumPtr> spectra;
00471 
00472     // SpectrumList implementation
00473 
00474     virtual size_t size() const {return spectra.size();}
00475     virtual bool empty() const {return spectra.empty();}
00476     virtual const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const;
00477     virtual SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData) const;
00478 };
00479 
00480 
00481 typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumListSimple> SpectrumListSimplePtr;

00484 struct Run : public ParamContainer
00485 {
00486     std::string id;
00487     InstrumentPtr instrumentPtr;
00488     SamplePtr samplePtr;
00489     std::string startTimeStamp;
00490     std::vector<SourceFilePtr> sourceFilePtrs;
00491     SpectrumListPtr spectrumListPtr;
00492 
00493     Run(){}
00494     bool empty() const;
00495 
00496     private:
00497     // no copying - any implementation must handle:
00498     // - SpectrumList cloning
00499     // - internal cross-references to heap-allocated objects 
00500     Run(const Run&);
00501     Run& operator=(const Run&);
00502 };

00505 struct MSData
00506 {
00507     std::string accession;
00508     std::string id;
00509     std::string version;
00510     std::vector<CV> cvs; 
00511     FileDescription fileDescription;
00512     std::vector<ParamGroupPtr> paramGroupPtrs;
00513     std::vector<SamplePtr> samplePtrs;
00514     std::vector<InstrumentPtr> instrumentPtrs;
00515     std::vector<SoftwarePtr> softwarePtrs;
00516     std::vector<DataProcessingPtr> dataProcessingPtrs;
00517     Run run;
00518 
00519     MSData(){}
00520     bool empty() const;
00521 
00522     private:
00523     // no copying
00524     MSData(const MSData&);
00525     MSData& operator=(const MSData&);
00526 };
